item.description:
Come celebrate the holidays with us at Leons.


Featuring three female vocalists ("The Sin Sisters") and a solid rhythm section (also vocalists), "The Spectacles" are a versatile, energetic, and fun band. Their music consists of popular dance tunes from the 1940's to current hits including a unique performance of classic rock, disco, swing, Motown, and standards. Having been one of Connecticut's most popular bands for over 10 years, they have performed at hundreds of weddings, shows, clubs, and concerts. Sharing the stage with many rock & roll legends including The Coasters, The Classics, John Cafferty & The Beaver Brown Band, The Rascals, Johnny Maestro & The Brooklyn Bridge, Southside Johnny & The Asbury Jukes, The Drifters and Lou Christie they have performed for audiences of over 10,000. Check out one of their exciting, energetic, and fun shows to see what everyone is talking about!

In the end, it's all about a good time"
http://www.thespectac...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the bar.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Spectacles featuring the Sin Sisters @ Leon's
